Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class GUIHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.GUIHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
it.polimi.ingsw.util.Observer<it.polimi.ingsw.client.MessageHandler>
public class GUIHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements it.polimi.ingsw.util.Observer<it.polimi.ingsw.client.MessageHandler>
It is the interface of GUI towards and backwards network. It is responsible of every message which is sent on the net and received from it.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientConnection clientConnection
    It represents the client's connection to the net.
    private it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientMessage clientMessage
    It is the message which is going to be sent on the internet, to communicate client's decisions.
    private int gameID
    It is the gameID associated to client's match .
    private java.util.List<it.polimi.ingsw.model.God> gods
    It is the list of gods chosen by the challenger.
    private java.lang.String messageFromServer
    It is a message sent by the server, which communicates the current state of the game process.
    private it.polimi.ingsw.client.MessageHandler messageHandler
    It handles all the messages which come from the internet.
    private it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.Mode mode
    It is the mode chosen by the client to play the game.
    private java.lang.String nickname
    It is the nickname chosen by the client to play the game.
    private int numOfPlayers
    It is the number of players playing the same match of the client.
    private it.polimi.ingsw.model.SerializableLiteGame serializableLiteGame
    It contains useful information about the match, as players' names, players' gods and game-table.
    private it.polimi.ingsw.client.SettingGameMessage settingGameMessage
    It is the message sent by the client to start a game.
    private boolean updateLG
    If true, it lets the method readSerializableLG() terminate.
    private boolean updateString
    If true, it lets the method readString() terminate.

  • Field Details

    • clientConnection

      private final it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientConnection clientConnection
      It represents the client's connection to the net. It let the GUI send messages on the internet

    • clientMessage

      private it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientMessage clientMessage
      It is the message which is going to be sent on the internet, to communicate client's decisions.

    • messageHandler

      private it.polimi.ingsw.client.MessageHandler messageHandler
      It handles all the messages which come from the internet.

    • updateString

      private boolean updateString
      If true, it lets the method readString() terminate.

    • updateLG

      private boolean updateLG
      If true, it lets the method readSerializableLG() terminate.

    • nickname

      private java.lang.String nickname
      It is the nickname chosen by the client to play the game.

    • messageFromServer

      private java.lang.String messageFromServer
      It is a message sent by the server, which communicates the current state of the game process.

    • numOfPlayers

      private int numOfPlayers
      It is the number of players playing the same match of the client. Client is counted too.

    • settingGameMessage

      private it.polimi.ingsw.client.SettingGameMessage settingGameMessage
      It is the message sent by the client to start a game.

    • gameID

      private int gameID
      It is the gameID associated to client's match .

    • mode

      private it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.Mode mode
      It is the mode chosen by the client to play the game.

    • gods

      private java.util.List<it.polimi.ingsw.model.God> gods
      It is the list of gods chosen by the challenger. If the client is the challenger, this list will be filled by the client itself and sent with the method sendChallengerMessage(). Else, it will be sent on the internet by the challenger and read through the method readString() by the client's GUI.

    • serializableLiteGame

      private it.polimi.ingsw.model.SerializableLiteGame serializableLiteGame
      It contains useful information about the match, as players' names, players' gods and game-table. It is not modifiable.

    • loadFXMLFile

      public void loadFXMLFile​(javafx.scene.Node node, javafx.stage.Stage nextStage, java.lang.String fileToLoad)
      It opens a new stage, loading a new scene based on the FXML file "fileToLoad". It closes the previous stage.
      Parameters:
      node - An element of the previous stage. It is needed to close that one.
      nextStage - It is the stage to set.
      fileToLoad - FXML file to load on the scene.

    • setClientConnection

      public boolean setClientConnection()
      It establishes the connection with the server.
      Returns:
      true if the server is active, false otherwise.
